content.text:
# List of naval battles during the Imjin War

During the Imjin War, there were a number of naval battles.
{| class="wikitable"
! style="width: 8.5em;" | Date !! Battles !! location !! Korean Commanders !! Japanese Commanders !! Result
|-
| 1592 June 16(May 7) || Battle of Okpo || Geoje okpo || align=center| Yi Sun-sinWŏn Kyun || align=center|Todo Takatora|| Decisive Korean victory.
|-
| 1592 June 16(May 7) || Battle of Happo || Masan Sanho-dong ||align=center|Yi Sun-sinWŏn Kyun || ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1592 June 17(May 8) || Battle of Jeokjinpo || Goseong Georyu-myeon, Tongyeong Gwangdo-myeon || align=center|Yi Sun-sinWŏn Kyun|| ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1592 (May 29) || Battle of Sacheon || Sacheon Yonghyeon-myeon  || align=center|Yi Sun-sinWŏn Kyun ||align=center|Kurushima Michiyuki||Decisive Korean victory. Turtle Ship first appearance.
|-
| 1592 (June 2) || Battle of Dangpo || Tongyeong Sanyang-eup || align=center|Yi Sun-sin || align=center|Kamei Korenori ||Decisive Korean victory.
|-
| 1592 (June 5) || First Danghangpo Battle || Goseong hoehwa-myeon Danghangpo-ri || align=center|Yi Sun-sinYi Ŏkki || ||Decisive Korean victory.
|-
| 1592 (June 6) || Battle of Yulpo || Geoje Jangmok-myeon || align=center|Yi Sun-sin || ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1592 August 14 (July 8)|| Battle of Hansan Island || Tongyeong Hansan-myeon || align=center|Yi Sun-sinYi ŎkkiWŏn Kyun || align=center|Wakizaka Yasuharu ||Decisive Korean victory.
|-
| 1592 August 16(July 10) || Battle of Angolpo || Jinhae Angol-dong || align=center|Yi Sun-sinYi ŎkkiWŏn Kyun || align=center|Kuki Yoshiaki ||Decisive Korean victory.
|-
| 1592(August 29) || Battle of Jangnimpo ||Busan Saha-gu Jangrim-dong || align=center|Yi Sun-sinYi ŎkkiWŏn Kyun || ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1592 October 5(September 1) || Battle of Hwajungumi || Busan Saha-gu Molundae || align=center|Yi Sun-sin || ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1592 October 5(September 1)|| Battle of Dadaepo || Busan Saha-gu Dadae-dong || align=center|Yi Sun-sin || ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1592 October 5(September 1)|| Battle of Seopeongpo || Busan Saha-gu Gupyeong-dong Gamcheon || align=center|Yi Sun-sin || ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1592 October 5(September 1)|| Battle of Jeolyeong Island || Busan Yeongdo-gu || align=center|Yi Sun-sin || ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1592 October 5(September 1)|| Battle of Choryangmok || Busan Dong-gu Choryang-dong|| align=center|Yi Sun-sin || ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1592 October 5(September 1)|| Battle of Busan || Busan Dong-gu Jwacheon-dong || align=center|Yi Sun-sinYi ŎkkiWŏn Kyun || ||Decisive Korean victory.
|-
| 1593 March 6(February 10) || Battle of Ungpo || Jinhae Ungcheon-dong || align=center|Yi Sun-sinYi ŎkkiWŏn Kyun || ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1594(March 4) || Second Danghangpo Battle || Goseong hoehwa-myeon Danghangpo-ri || align=center|Yi Sun-sinYi ŎkkiWŏn KyunEo Yeong-dam || ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1594(October 4) || Battle of Jangmunpo || Geoje Jangmok-myeon Jangmok-ri || align=center|Yi Sun-sin || ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1597 August 28(July 16)|| Battle of Chilcheollyang || Geoje Chilcheollyang|| align=center|Wŏn KyunYi ŎkkiCh'oe Ho || align=center|Todo TakatoraWakizaka YasuharuKonishi Yukinaga || Decisive Japanese victory.
|-
| 1597(August 27) || Battle of Eoranpo || Haenam Songji-myeon Eoranpo || align=center|Yi Sun-sin || ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1597년 October 16(September 7)|| Battle of Byeokpajin || Jindo Gogun-myeon Byeokpajin || align=center|Yi Sun-sin || ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1597년 October 25(September 16) || Battle of Myeongnyang || Haenam Munnae-myeon, Jindo nokjin-ri || align=center|Yi Sun-sinKim Ŏkch'u ||align=center|Todo TakatoraKurushima MichifusaKatō YoshiakiWakizaka Yasuharu||Decisive Korean victory.
|-
| 1598(July 19)|| Battle of Jeolyi Island || Goheung Geumsan-myeon Geogeum Island || align=center|Yi Sun-sin || ||Korean victory.
|-
| 1598 October 19 - November 6 || Battle of Jang Island || Suncheon Jangdo|| align=center|Yi Sun-sinChen Lin || Konishi Yukinaga ||Korean navy rescued the Chinese navy from the Japanese blockade. However, whole of operation was failed.
|-
| 1598 December 16(November 19) || Battle of Noryang || Namhae Seolcheon-myeon Noryang-ri || align=center|Yi Sun-sinChen Lin || align=center|Konishi YukinagaShimazu YoshihiroWakizaka YasuharuSo Yoshitoshi|| Decisive Korean and Chinese victory. Death of Admiral Yi.
